title: Pound rises briefly after lawmakers move to block no-deal Brexit
text:
Pound rises briefly after lawmakers move to block no-deal Brexit

Forex 2 hours ago (Sep 03, 2019 23:30)

© Reuters. Pound rises briefly after lawmakers move to block no-deal Brexit NEW YORK, Sept 3 (Reuters) - Sterling posted a brief rise against the dollar late on Tuesday after UK lawmakers approved a motion to seize control of parliamentary time to try to block Britain leaving the European Union with no deal. 5:25 p.m. (1925 GMT), the pound GBP=D3 was little changed from its Tuesday close at $1.2083, while the euro was flat at $1.0975.

Pound rises briefly after lawmakers move to block no-deal Brexit
description: Pound rises briefly after lawmakers move to block no-deal Brexit
